testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: The "ufpassword" (forgot password) page should contain a "user login" link to return to the login page,
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "url" address....................................passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed And The user clicks on forgot password link.................................passed And The user verifies that there is a user login link on the ufpassword page to return to the login page.passed And The user clicks on the user login link..................................passed Then The user verifies that the link redirects to the userlogin page........passed
